In an increasingly shrinking, interdependent world, an understanding of diplomacy and diplomatic processes is critical for work in global business, international organizations and government. Students who complete this certificate program will have gained experience in diplomatic history, concepts, theories, methods, protocol and practice. Certificates will be awarded only at the time of degree completion.
Certificate Admission Requirements
None
Certificate Requirements
A minimum overall GPA of 2.0 is required in courses used to satisfy the certificate.
At least 12 hours used in the certificate must be earned at UCF within the participating departments.
Prerequisite Courses
Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.
